<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

Indexing a specific tensor dimension.

Selecting `dimension=2` and `index=42` is similar to doing `tensor[:, :, 42, :, :, ‚Ä¶]` in numpy.

## Fields

* dimension: `u32`
* index: `u64`
